body: At 11th level, when the paladin hits an evil humanoid with an attack of opportunity, she deals an additional 1d6 points of damage. When using holy reach, the paladin may make a number of additional attacks of opportunity per round equal to her Charisma bonus. This increase stacks with similar increases from other sources such as Combat Reflexes. This ability replaces aura of justice.
name: Hordebreaker
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Paladin/Paladin Archetypes/Oathbound Paladin/Oaths/Oath against Savagery/Hordebreaker
